title: there are too many anti burst items yet not even 1 anti dps item
body: steraks, maw, GA, zhonyas, QSS somewhat etc are all anti burst yet there is no single anti dps item, there needs to be an item with weak stats but made u take 8% less dmg from the target thats damaging u the most, stacks up to 5 times, so DPS mages and adcs will have counterplay late game maybe
